content:
Technology has truly advanced a lot over the years. I remember when I was still
a child and I only imagined robots talking to me like a human being. Looking
back and taking a course in Computer Science has made me very aware of the
recent technological advancements. This imagination is now a reality, and will
surely be improved further. Today, I use AI as an everyday tool to help in
reviewing and answering. It feels like it is my companion in pursuing my passion
for building applications. It has helped me achieve good standing in my

for building applications. It has helped me achieve good standing in my
academic life. However, I also canâ€™t help but feel that even when it improves
my productivity, it has made me reliant on it to the point that I may not do my
tasks effectively without it. I remember when I used to dive through
documentation and forums to give an answer to a problem I was facing when
doing my programming work. But now I leverage AI to solve it. But my
education never stops from there since I also review the AI answers to create
my own answers. AI has really changed the game of productivity for me, but in

my own answers. AI has really changed the game of productivity for me, but in
the end, if you let this technology make everything for you, then you will not
learn anything, so I suggest you should still always study and only treat this as a
helper. As I learn more about this technology, I also learn how to use it properly
and ethically to ensure that it benefits me, rather than negatively impacting me
by transforming me into someone who cannot think for myself. In the future, I
intend to continue being aware of the technological advancements in society

intend to continue being aware of the technological advancements in society
and also contribute to it to ensure everyone in the digital sphere in the
Philippines is safe.
